text.__SUMMARY__: The greater tube-nosed bat (Murina leucogaster) is a species of bat.  An adult greater tube-nosed bat has a body length of 4.2-5.7 cm, a tail length of 3.6-4.1 cm, and a wing length of 3.7-4.4 cm.  The species is found in India, Mongolia, China, and Korea.

text.References: Won, Byeong-o (원병오) (2004). 한국의 포유동물 (Hangugui poyudongmul, Mammals of Korea). Seoul: Dongbang Media. ISBN 89-8457-310-8.
